caseTitle: Dr. Muhammad Amin v. Zarai Taraqiati Bank Ltd thr. Board of Director, Islamabad & others
tagline: Discussion on Rule 1 & 2 of Order II, C.P.C. Every suit shall include the whole of the claim which the plaintiff is entitled to make in respect of the cause of action. The expression “cause of action” means a bundle of facts which required to be incorporated in the plaint in terms of Rule 1 of Order VII C.P.C.
